name: Noisetoys 1 - Sample & Ambient
description:
Noisetoys 1 contains a bunch of toys that you can use to play with the sounds around you. 

Record, slow down, speed up, skip, wobble, pan and mix. Compose or just kick back and listen.

Featuring tape loops, granular looping, built in field and ambient recordings, delay, reverb and a few more things.
